channel.title: Custom item help
channel.description: Im sorry if this question is always asked, but the search bar didn't give the answers i need. So basically my problem is that when i put on a custom item that I made, i turn invisible and the item is too. The other custom items that i didnt make work perfectly. So after doing some troubleshooting I realized that the problem lies with either the model itself or the way the Datmaker converts. The item model has no lines or quads, when i convert it properly to a DAT file and open it up in RSMV, it is invisible.

item.title: Custom item help
item.dc:creator: @vishkl vishkl
item.description:
@vishkl wrote:

um maybe your client is updated with those items.

Read full topic
